short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture a screenshot of the current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Screenshot Capture is a quick and easy tool for taking screenshots of the current tab. With a simple click, 
you can capture the visible area of any webpage and save it as a high-quality PNG image. Perfect for saving 
important information, sharing website visuals, or just capturing what you see on your screen.

Key Features:

- One-Click Capture: Take a screenshot of the current tab with a single button click.
- Instant Download: Automatically save the captured image as a PNG file.
- Simple Interface: Easy-to-use interface with no extra clutter.
- Fast & Lightweight: Designed to be fast and lightweight, with minimal impact on your browsing experience.
			
How to Use:

- Click the Screenshot Capture extension icon in your Chrome toolbar.
- In the popup, click "Capture Screenshot."
- The captured image will automatically download to your device!
			
Permissions:
			
This extension only requires permission to capture the active tab and download the image to your computer. 
It does not track any browsing data or save any personal information.

Take screenshots effortlessly with Screenshot Capture! Ideal for students, professionals, designers, and 
anyone who needs to save or share what they see online.

Support: 
			
For any questions or support requests, please contact mehrazmorshed@gmail.com.
